scripts.dump: bun ./prv_tools/dump ./backend/ --filter codestyle > code_all.prv.txt && bun ./prv_tools/dump ./frontend-vanilla/ --filter codestyle >> code_all.prv.txt && bun ./prv_tools/dump ./backend/ --filter codestyle > code_be.prv.txt && bun ./prv_tools/dump ./frontend-vanilla/ --filter codestyle > code_fe.prv.txt
